Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor vs. The Undersea Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the adventures of the Human Meteor as he transitions from dealing with cop shooters to uncovering and confronting an international espionage plot involving a Japanese submarine and a suspicious yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Prologue and City Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: The story begins underwater and quickly shifts to a city scene where Duke, the taxi driver, gets involved with wealthy men and a suspicious tail.

sub_scenes.title: Cop Shooters and Hospital Intrigue
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor deals swiftly with 'cop shooters' and then gets entangled in a new case from a hospital patient about a suspicious yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Duke and Toby devise a plan to infiltrate the yacht, leading to Toby's dangerous mission and the revelation of a Japanese submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby Infiltrates the Yacht and is Spotted

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Battle and Ship Attack
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor responds to Toby's intel, leading to an underwater confrontation with divers and a dramatic attack on the yacht's ship.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor Responds to the Call
Divers Identify and Target Human Meteor
Human Meteor Responds to Divers' Aggression
Diver's Threat and Human Meteor's Retaliation Hint
Spear Gun Attack and Cry for Help
Human Meteor's Torpedo Attack on Submarine
Human Meteor's Finishing Blow to Ship

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Domestic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor investigates the yacht, uncovers Peter's treachery, and the story concludes with a hospital visit and a return to Duke's domestic life.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter's Death on Yacht
Human Meteor Searches for Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Evening Car Ride and Domestic Scene with Toby and Duke

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Sabotage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Liberty Lads as they uncover and thwart a Nazi sabotage plot, culminating in a dramatic confrontation and the arrival of the Marines.

sub_scenes.title: Street Scene and Ambulance Mystery
sub_scenes.description: The scene opens with the Liberty Lads confronting Nazis, shifting to a street where boys observe a mysterious ambulance arrival.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Clue and Garage Investigation
sub_scenes.description: The boys find a dropped wallet, leading them to a garage and a strange encounter with a saluting Marine and a civilian Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Revealed

sub_scenes.title: Garage Interception and Mr. Horst's Threat
sub_scenes.description: The boys' investigation at the garage leads to their interception by an officer and a menacing encounter with Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Garage and Interception

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Conspiracy, and Major Bronson's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys while his associates plot a sinister carbon monoxide scheme. Major Bronson's unexpected arrival changes the scene.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation and Agreement on Carbon Monoxide Plan

sub_scenes.title: Chaos, Betrayal, and Marine Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Fighting erupts, Major Bronson threatens the boys, but his lawyer's sudden violence leads to a chaotic shift in allegiance and the eventual arrival of the Marines to save the day.

narrative_arcs.title: Plan to Seek Help and Sergeant Encounter
Urgent News and Car Crash at Barracks
Immediate Aid and Call for Ambulance

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and the Kidnapping of Rosita
Major_Arcs.description: Major arc focusing on The Champ and Henry's vacation turning into an investigation into Rosita's kidnapping by Axis-linked bandit El Tigre in South America.

sub_scenes.title: South American Setting and Military Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry in a South American town, where they are unexpectedly interrogated by the military regarding Rosita's kidnapping.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Plan and Forced Kidnapping
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre's demands are revealed as his men kidnap The Champ and Henry, believing they are going to help rescue Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Demands and Forced Carjacking
The Forced Drive and Destination Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding and Infiltration Plan
sub_scenes.description: 'Mama' pleads for help from the kidnapped Americans, while a separate group plans an infiltration of El Tigre's hideout.

sub_scenes.title: Chaos at Hideout and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Infiltration leads to chaos and interrogation, culminating in Rosita's rescue and ongoing combat against Nazis.

narrative_arcs.title: Claim of Identity Theft by Axis Agents
Rosita Held by Axis Agents, Rescue Plan
Escape to Citadel and Hotel Strategy

sub_scenes.title: Concluding Battles and Recognition
sub_scenes.description: The rescue mission concludes with final battles, the arrival of government troops, and recognition for The Champ's bravery.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan and the Sub Detector Plans
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting as he disobeys orders, possesses vital sub detector plans, and becomes entangled in a conflict involving native tribes and enemy agents.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Disobedience Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan fights in the jungle while back on the ship, officers discuss his disobedience and the importance of the sub detector plans he carries.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Mission and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Two men arrive in the jungle on a mission related to the captain's son, while another character's jungle trek leads him into a native ambush.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle River Journey and Perceived Danger

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Capture and Torture for Plans
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured and interrogated by enemy agents who demand the sub detector plans, resorting to torture to force his compliance.

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Native Attack, and Captain's Orders
sub_scenes.description: Dolan continues sabotage through arson, Grauer plans to eliminate natives, and the Marines launch an attack.

narrative_arcs.title: Marines' Onslaught and Grauer's Strategic Talk
Grauer's Dismissal and Native Hut Burning

sub_scenes.title: Native Camp Assault and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Dolan attacks a native camp, leading to the accidental death of the chief and a surprising alliance with the natives against common enemies.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Conflict and Discipline
sub_scenes.description: Orders to surrender create conflict on ship, leading to a father-son confrontation and a deck fistfight, resolved by rescinded orders and disciplinary action.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Case of the Blood Transfusion
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Twinkle Twins, Diane and Dan, as they investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering a complex web of racketeering and a desperate need for a blood transfusion.

sub_scenes.title: Story Intro and Newsroom Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the 'Twinkle Twins' story and their briefing at the Weston newspaper office about the Robert Burgess murder case.

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Lead
sub_scenes.description: The twins visit the police station, learning about Guy Reilly and a sick child in the hospital, leading them to a new investigative direction.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Blood Type Mystery
sub_scenes.description: At the hospital, they meet Miss Reilly and discover the complication of her rare blood type and Farnacci's potential involvement.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Suspicions and Criminal Eavesdropping
sub_scenes.description: The twins suspect racketeering and contact Elijah. Simultaneously, an eavesdropper uncovers a criminal plot involving Farnacci.

sub_scenes.title: Search for Tom Reilly and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The twins decide to seek Tom Reilly and encounter Mrs. Murphy, who reveals crucial information about Farnacci's actions and danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly and Initial Encounter
Conversation with Mrs. Murphy about Farnacci

sub_scenes.title: Chase, Blockade, and Mob Justice
sub_scenes.description: Attempt to apprehend Tom Reilly leads to a chase, a human blockade by an angry Irish neighborhood, and an outbreak of mob justice.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Chase of Tom Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Community Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: Injured are rushed to the hospital, where a blood transfusion is needed. Community steps up to donate blood despite initial incompatibility issues.

narrative_arcs.title: Rushed to Ambulance and Onward Concern
Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion News
Community Rushes to Donate and Hospital Anxiety
Blood Type Confirmation, Transfusion Preparation, and Recovery

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Tom Reilly recovers, setting up future discussions and leading to a birthday celebration for Lassie Reilly's recovery and the apprehension of the true murderer.

narrative_arcs.title: Threats and Determination to Capture Farnacci
Police Respond and Arrest the Murderer
